mapper.select: select a.employee_id,b.scheme_id from wk_hrm_employee a left join wk_hrm_employee_social_security_info b on a.employee_id = b.employee_id where b.scheme_id is not null and a.is_del = 0 and a.entry_status != 4

select a.i_emp_record_id,a.employee_id,b.employee_name,b.dept_id,date_format(b.entry_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as entry_time,b.post,b.mobile,b.job_number, c.name as deptName,d.city,d.scheme_name,d.scheme_id, a.personal_insurance_amount,a.personal_provident_fund_amount, a.corporate_insurance_amount,a.corporate_provident_fund_amount,b.is_del from wk_hrm_insurance_month_emp_record a left join wk_hrm_employee b on a.employee_id = b.employee_id left join wk_hrm_dept c on b.dept_id = c.dept_id left join wk_hrm_insurance_scheme d on a.scheme_id = d.scheme_id left join wk_hrm_insurance_month_record e on a.i_record_id = e.i_record_id where a.i_record_id = #{data.iRecordId} and (e.status = 1 or (e.status = 0 and b.is_del = 0))
and b.employee_name like concat('%',#{data.employeeName},'%')
and d.scheme_id = #{data.schemeId}
and d.city like concat('%',#{data.city},'%')
and b.employee_id in
#{employeeId}
and a.status = 0
and a.status = 1
select i_emp_record_id from wk_hrm_insurance_month_emp_record a left join wk_hrm_employee b on a.employee_id = b.employee_id where a.i_record_id = #{iRecordId} and b.is_del = 1
